be.ac.umons.model.hexagon

Class Hexagon

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.model.hexagon.Hexagon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bridge, Empty, Gate, Mirror, Modifier, Source, Splitter, Target, Wall

    public abstract class Hexagon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Base class for all classes representing an hexagon on the map
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getNextEdges

        public final Edge[] getNextEdges(Edge edge,
                                 Laser laser)
        Get the outgoing edges of a laser entering by a certain edge taking into account the rotation of the Hexagon object
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge through which the laser enters
        laser - the laser
        Returns:
        an array containing the outgoing edges

        laser - the laser
        Returns:

      • getNextLaser

        public final Laser getNextLaser(Edge edge,
                                Laser laser)
        Get the laser modified after traversing the Hexagon using the method getNextLaserWithoutRot(Edge, Laser)
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge by which the laser enters in the hexagon
        laser - the laser traversing the Hexagon
        Returns:
        the laser modified

      • getNextLaserWithoutRot

                                       Laser laser)
        Get the laser modified after traversing the Hexagon without taking into account the rotation of the hexagon
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge by which the laser enters in the hexagon
        laser - the laser traversing the Hexagon
        Returns:
        the modified laser

      • getNextLaserModifier

        public final Laser getNextLaserModifier(Laser laser)
        Get the laser modified after traversing the modifier of the hexagon if it exists
        Parameters:
        laser - the laser traversing the modifier of the hexagon
        Returns:
        the modified laser

      • traverse

        public final void traverse(Edge edge,
                           Laser laser)
        Notify the hexagon that a laser has traversed it by keeping the incoming and outgoing edges. Note : this information can be used later to check if a laser will cross another laser with the method containsLaser(Edge, Laser).
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge through which the hexagon is traversed
        laser - the laser traversing the hexagon

      • traverseBack

        public final void traverseBack(Edge edge,
                               Laser laser)
        Undo the effect of traverse(Edge, Laser)
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge through which the hexagon will not be traversed anymore
        laser - the laser for which the effect has to be undone

      • reset

        public final void reset()
        Set the hexagon as not traversed by any laser

      • containsLaser

        public final boolean containsLaser(Edge edge,
                                   Laser laser)
        Check if a laser will cross another laser when traversing the hexagon
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge by which the hexagon is traversed
        laser - the laser that will traverse the hexagon
        Returns:
        whether the laser will cross another laser

        Returns:
